headline: U.S. oil stocks explode after Trump’s actions, comments on Venezuela
summary: Investing.com -- Oil stocks rose sharply on Monday after U.S. President Donald Trump said Venezuela’s removal from Nicolas Maduro’s rule could unlock access to the country’s massive oil resources, potentially altering global energy dynamics.

content.title: U.S. oil stocks explode after Trump’s actions, comments on Venezuela

headline: Chevron, Exxon and SLB Stocks Are Surging but Oil Prices Are Hardly Moving. What’s Up.
summary: Oil stocks were soaring early Monday even as crude prices were largely unmoved following the surprise U.S. operation to capture Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro.

headline: U.S. Energy Company Shares Rise Premarket
summary: Shares in U.S. energy companies surged premarket after President Trump pledged to dispatch American drillers to revive Venezuela's crude production. Among the big gainers was Chevron, up around 8% ahead of Monday's open.

content.title: U.S. Energy Company Shares Rise Premarket

headline: US invades Venezuela, market reaction, CES kicks off: 3 Things
summary: Oil prices (CL=F, BZ=F) and related stocks rise following the US invasion of Venezuela and capture of President Nicolás Maduro. US stock futures (ES=F, NQ=F, YM=F) inch slightly higher in Monday's premarket in response to the geopolitical headlines. CES 2026 kicks off today in Las Vegas with presentations from Nvidia (NVDA) CEO Jensen Huang and Advanced Micro Devices (AMD) CEO Lisa Su. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.

content.title: US invades Venezuela, market reaction, CES kicks off: 3 Things
content.description:
Oil prices (CL=F, BZ=F) and related stocks rise following the US invasion of Venezuela and capture of President Nicolás Maduro.

US stock futures (ES=F, NQ=F, YM=F) inch slightly higher in Monday's premarket in response to the geopolitical headlines.

CES 2026 kicks off today in Las Vegas with presentations from Nvidia (NVDA) CEO Jensen Huang and Advanced Micro Devices (AMD) CEO Lisa Su.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.

headline: These Oil Stocks Take Off As Trump Says U.S. Oil Companies 'Very Much Involved' In Venezuela Transition
summary: Chevron and other U.S. oil stocks soared in Monday's stock market. U.S. oil prices increased less than 1%.

headline: Stocks Set to Open Higher as Investors Stay Calm Despite Venezuela Tumult, U.S. Jobs Data Awaited
summary: March S&P 500 E-Mini futures (ESH26) are up +0.27%, and March Nasdaq 100 E-Mini futures (NQH26) are up +0.64% this morning, pointing to a higher open on Wall Street despite fresh geopolitical tensions following the U.S. military operation that captured Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro.

content.title: Stocks Set to Open Higher as Investors Stay Calm Despite Venezuela Tumult, U.S. Jobs Data Awaited
content.summary: March S&P 500 E-Mini futures (ESH26) are up +0.27%, and March Nasdaq 100 E-Mini futures (NQH26) are up +0.64% this morning, pointing to a higher open on Wall Street despite fresh geopolitical tensions following the U.S. military operation that captured Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro.

headline: Trump's Maduro ousting: Oil prices tick higher, oil stocks rally
summary: Oil prices (CL=F, BZ=F) are up only slightly after US President Trump ousted Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro. Oil companies, like Chevron (CVX), SLB Limited (SLB), and Halliburton (HAL), are rallying on the news. Yahoo Finance Breaking News Reporter Jake Conley joins Morning Brief to discuss the moves in the oil market and energy companies. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.

content.title: Trump's Maduro ousting: Oil prices tick higher, oil stocks rally
content.description:
Oil prices (CL=F, BZ=F) are up only slightly after US President Trump ousted Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro. Oil companies, like Chevron (CVX), SLB Limited (SLB), and Halliburton (HAL), are rallying on the news.

Yahoo Finance Breaking News Reporter Jake Conley joins Morning Brief to discuss the moves in the oil market and energy companies.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.

headline: U.S. Energy Company Shares Rise
summary: Shares in U.S. energy companies rallied after President Trump pledged to dispatch American drillers to revive Venezuela’s crude production.  Among the big gainers was Chevron, up more than 4%.  The company is the sole remaining U.S. oil major in Venezuela.

content.title: U.S. Energy Company Shares Rise
content.summary: Shares in U.S. energy companies rallied after President Trump pledged to dispatch American drillers to revive Venezuela’s crude production.  Among the big gainers was Chevron, up more than 4%.  The company is the sole remaining U.S. oil major in Venezuela.
